Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

Data_Set_PDS3.citation_text: McLaughlin, S.A., M.F. A'Hearn, D. Deming, K.P. Klaasen, D. Wellnitz, B. Carcich, and T. Hewagama, DEEP IMPACT/EPOXI DOCUMENTATION SET V2.0, DI-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI/ITS-6-DOC-SET-V2.0, NASA Planetary Data System, 2009.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_terse_desc: Documentation collection for raw and calibrated data sets from the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions.
Data_Set_PDS3.abstract_desc: This data set is the collection of documentation for the raw and calibrated data sets from the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions.
Data_Set_PDS3.data_set_desc:
Data Set Overview ================= This data set is the collection of documentation for the raw and calibrated data sets from the Deep Impact and EPOXI missions, including pre-launch thermal-vacuum data sets.
This documentation set should be used when working with the following Deep Impact data sets:
Thermal-Vacuum -------------- TV1 : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-GROUND-TV1-V1.0 TV2 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV-2-GROUND-TV2-V1.0 TV3 : DII-CAL-ITS-2-GROUND-TV3-V1.0 TV4 : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV/MRI-2-GROUND-TV4-V1.0
Deep Impact Flight - Science ---------------------------- HRII raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRII-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRII calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-HRII-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
HRIV raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRIV raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRIV calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-HRIV-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 MRI calibrated encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DIF-C-MRI-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
ITS raw cruise : DII-CAL-ITS-2-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 ITS calibrated encounter : DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V2.0 DII-C-ITS-3/4-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
Instrument Temps : DIF-C-HRII/HRIV/MRI-6-TEMPS-V1.0 Tempel 1 Photometry : DIF-C-MRI-5-TEMPEL1-PHOTOMETRY-V1.0
Deep Impact Flight - Navigation Imaging --------------------------------------- HRII raw cruise : DIF-CAL-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.0 HRII raw encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0 HRII calibrated encounter : DIF-C-HRIV-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
MRI raw cruise : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1 MRI raw encounter : DIF-C-MRI-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1 MRI calibrated encounter : DIF-C-MRI-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1
ITS raw cruise : DII-CAL-ITS-2-NAV-9P-CRUISE-V1.1 ITS raw encounter : DII-C-ITS-2-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.1 ITS calibrated encounter : DII-C-ITS-3-NAV-9P-ENCOUNTER-V1.0
EPOXI ----- HRII raw calibrations : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V1.0 HRIV raw calibrations : DIF-CAL-HRII-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V1.0 MRI raw calibrations : DIF-CAL-MRI-2-EPOXI-CALIBRATIONS-V1.0
HRII raw Earth obs : DIF-E-HRII-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRII calibrated Earth obs : DIF-E-HRII-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRIV raw Earth obs : DIF-E-HRIV-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 HRIV calibrated Earth obs : DIF-E-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 MRI raw Earth obs : DIF-E-MRI-2-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0 MRI calibrated Earth obs : DIF-E-MRI-3/4-EPOXI-EARTH-V1.0
HRIV raw stellar transit obs : DIF-X-HRIV-2-EPOXI-EXOPLANETS-V1.0 HRIV calib. stellar transit obs : DIF-X-HRIV-3/4-EPOXI-EXOPLANETS-V1.0
Instrument Temps : DIF-CAL-HRII/HRIV/MRI-6-EPOXI-TEMPS-V1.0
Data_Set_PDS3.confidence_level_note:
Confidence Level Overview ========================= The documentation in this data set was prepared, used, and internally checked by the science, navigation, data center, and archive teams for the Deep Impact and EPOXI projects.
Review ====== Earlier, partial versions of this data set for Deep Impact passed PDS peer reviews held during 2006. The final, full version 1.0 of this data set for Deep Impact was reviewed in April 2007 and was accepted for the PDS archive pending resolution of liens (that were completed in December 2007).
This combined documentation collection for Deep Impact and EPOXI, version 2.0, is archived at the PDS Small Bodies Node (SBN) and the Multi-Mission Archive at STScI (MAST). It passed a peer review held by SBN on 23 July 2009; personnel from MAST participated.
